# [Interview #885: AMOL Signing Report - Christine, Entry #17](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=885#17)

#### Question

How many volumes will there be for the encyclopedia?

#### Harriet McDougal

One, but it will be fat, and hoping for a disk.
